newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan rupee closes steady in kerb, seen stable.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan rupee closes steady in kerb, seen stable.

text.p: The Pakistani rupee closed steady in kerb trade at 39.13 to the dollar in a balanced market on Wednesday, dealers said.
"The rupee is likely to open unchanged on Thursday, if the State (central) Bank of Pakistan keeps the rupee rate stable," one dealer said.
The State (central) Bank of Pakistan rate, last changed on August 13, was 35.5300/35.7077 to the dollar.
The premium on the foreign exchange bearer certificates closed unchanged at 9.80 percent. -- Ibrahim Khan 9221-5685192
